Description.$t: It's a week before the Prom and tensions are high. All the school's couples are having issues during this Prom Week.
Things just haven't been working with Kate's relationship. Help get Kate out of her relationship with Nicholas.

Lil doesn't know what to do. Zack and Lil have been dating for so long but she is starting to get mixed feelings. Help Lil sort out her feelings by either having her break up with Zack and date someone new, or raise her romance towards Zack to a new level.

$c: Zack and Lil must be broken up and Lil must either be dating Doug or Simon.
Or Lil must have romance value greater than 50 towards Zack

Description.$t: Goth poster children Mave and Edward have been dating since forever, but maybe they're blinded to better options. Can you get both of them into a new relationship?

$c:
Mave and Edward are each dating two people, OR
							 Mave and Edward are both dating people and not eachother
This is here just to make the goal fire, the above is broken for some reason

Description.$t: OMG, it's the night of the Prom! With romantic tension so high, the decision for Prom Queen and King seems impossible. Will things ever go back to normal for these couples, or are they doomed to have relationship issues until Summer Vacation.

Rule.$c: - Magic checking who is Prom King?!

Description.$t: Please reload the webpage to restart the demo.

Ending.name: Goth Reunion - Mave
Ending.$c:
<Preconditions>	
        <Rule name="Mave is involved" id="0">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="mave" first="initiator" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Edward is involved" id="1">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="edward" first="responder" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
        <Rule name="still dating" id="2">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="responder" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Mave was dating someone but isn't anymore" id="3">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="other" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="true" window="50" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="1" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="other" relationship="dating" negated="true" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		</Preconditions>

Instantiation.name: They discover their true endless gothic love

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %i%, I'm sorry about going out with %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's okay my %sweetie%, I made some mistakes too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well what do we do now?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well the night is still young. Let us show the world our endless gothic love!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh %r%!

Ending.name: Goth Reunion - Edward
Ending.$c:
Preconditions>	
        <Rule name="Edward is involved" id="0">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="edward" first="initiator" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Mave is involved" id="1">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="mave" first="responder" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="not dating anymore" id="2">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="responder" relationship="dating" negated="true" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Edward was dating someone but isn't anymore" id="3">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="other" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="true" window="50" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="1" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="other" relationship="dating" negated="true" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		</Preconditions

Instantiation.name: They discover their true endless gothic love differently

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Shouldn't you be with %o% or something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It wasn't working out with %pron(o,him/her)%. %pron(o,He/She)% wasn't goth enough for me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well good riddance.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know I made a mistake, but I have seen the darkness. I want to be with you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i% my %sweetie%, how did I ever resist your gothic charm. Be mine forever!

Ending.name: Getting Over Zack
Ending.$c:
<Preconditions>	
        <Rule name="Lil is involved" id="0">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="lil" first="initiator" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Zack is involved" id="1">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="zack" first="responder" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="not dating anymore" id="2">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="responder" relationship="dating" negated="true" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Lil is dating someone else" id="3">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="other" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Zack doesn't like Lil much" id="4">
		  <Predicate type="network" networkType="buddy" first="responder" second="initiator" comparator="lessthan" value="35" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
		</Rule>
		</Preconditions>

Instantiation.name: Lil explains her feelings to Zack

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, you. Didn't you find someone else to depressed around?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm sorry about everything that happened earlier this week.
I was just so confused, and I didn't know what to do. I wanted to be with you but I wasn't sure. I didn't know the right answer

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well I hope you found your answer, and I better not even be a byte of it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I guess you just answered it. No way I'll ever be with you again.

Ending.name: Better Than Ever
Ending.$c:
<Preconditions>	
        <Rule name="Lil is involved" id="0">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="lil" first="initiator" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Zack is involved" id="1">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="zack" first="responder" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="still dating" id="2">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="responder" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		<Rule name="Their Love is so strong" id="3">
		  <Predicate type="network" networkType="romance" first="initiator" second="responder" comparator="greaterthan" value="50" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
		  <Predicate type="network" networkType="romance" first="responder" second="initiator" comparator="greaterthan" value="50" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		</Preconditions>

Instantiation.name: Zack and Lil admit endless summer love.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This is a great Prom!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I'm glad I went with you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What was going on with you this week?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing, I was just confused. I got through it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Does this mean we will continue to be together through the Summer.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course, we will spend every waking moment together, until Summer is over and we go back to school. I guess we can figure out a new schedule for being together then.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't wait.

Ending.name: Zack Triumphs
Ending.$c:
<Preconditions>	
        <Rule name="Zack (or Zacklike)" id="0">
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="arrogant" first="initiator" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
          <Predicate type="trait" trait="stubborn" first="initiator" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
        <Rule name="dating someone" id="1">
          <Predicate type="relationship" first="initiator" second="responder" relationship="dating" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="false" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
        <Rule name="done something lame ever" id="3">
          <Predicate type="SFDB label" first="initiator" second="" label="lame" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="true" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="false" numTimesUniquelyTrue="0" numTimesRoleSlot=""/>
        </Rule>
		</Preconditions>

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%, you did it! You're the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But of course, %r%. Did you ever doubt me? I never doubted me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, there was that one time when %toc1%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Silence! My first act as king is to strip that from the yearbook record!
For my second act... I think somebody is getting an upgrade.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%... you mean...?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know it, gigababe. You're now.... my tera-babe.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Best. Prom. Evar.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Alright!!
Come, my %gender(r,king,queen)%, let's wave to the little people...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: They look so small from over here...
Oh, %i%,  who would have thought the first time we met that one day we'd be crowned prom royalty!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... I couldn't say for both of us, but....
I always knew that %if(0,I'd)else(you'd)% be.
I'm the Prom %gender(i,King, Queen)%!  This is everything I ever wanted.
Except.... I always thought I'd have a Prom %if(0,princess)elseif(1,prince)elseif(2,king)else(queen)%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You will. There must be someone out there for you...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe that someone is closer than either of us realize.
%r%, will you be my Prom %if(0,princess)elseif(1,prince)elseif(2,king)else(queen)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%.  There are a million reasons to say no, and only one reason to say yes!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Then say yes.

Rule.name: i is female, r is female
i is male, r is male
i is female, r is male

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Alright, I'm the Prom %gender(i,King,Queen)%!  %positiveadj%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Woo-hoo!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'd like to thank everyone who helped make this moment possible, the Prom Selection Committee, my friends, %random(whoever invented proms back in the 1960s or whatever,the president of the United States,German expressionism,tofu products in general)%, %random(astronaut ice cream,Superman ice cream,the internet,the Academy)%, %random(the Police Academy,my barber,the circus,the dairy section at our local supermarket)%, %random(our high school,our team mascot,modern medicine,the letter Q)%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wrap it up!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And, uh, my parents and, of course, Mr. Al Garcia!  Thank you, good night!
